Package controller

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SimpleController
      • controller.BetterController
        • controller.GUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    public class GUIController
extends BetterController
    The GUIController class represents a controller that interacts with the model and view to provide the user with the ability to interact with the stock data. This controller is designed to be used with a GUI interface, that appends to the given DelayedInputStream object, throughout the lifetime of the program. This controller is designed to be used with the AdvancedStockView interface, which provides the methodology to display the results of the model's actions, and add custom functionality in between user interactions. TLDR: this controller is identical to the BetterController class, but uses a custom input stream that should get appended to throughout the lifetime of the program.

      Constructors

      GUIController​(BetterStockModel model, java.lang.Readable readable, AdvancedStockView stockView)
      Constructs a new BetterController object with the given model, readable, and view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIController

        public GUIController​(BetterStockModel model,
                     java.lang.Readable readable,
                     AdvancedStockView stockView)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new BetterController object with the given model, readable, and view. If the model, readable, or stockView is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        model - the BetterStockModel object to interact with stock data and user information
        stockView - the AdvancedStockView object to display the results of the model's actions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the model, readable, or stockView is null
